item.title: Aeraki
item.description: Aeraki [Air-rah-ki] is the Greek word for ‘breeze’. While Istio connects microservices in a service mesh, Aeraki provides a framework to allow Istio to support more layer-7 protocols other than just HTTP and gRPC. We hope this breeze can help Istio sail a little further.
